00023 // nEle tells you if the cut is on electron 1 (nEle=1), electron 2 (nEle=2), both(nEle=0)
00024 TCut ElectronCategory_class::GetCut(TString region, bool isMC, int nEle, bool corrEle){
00025 
00026 
00027   if(region.Sizeof()<=1){
00028     std::cerr << "[ERROR]: no region defined" << std::endl;
00029     return "error";
00030   }
00031   
00032   TCut cut;
00033   cut.Clear();
00034 
00035   std::set<TString> cutSet = GetCutSet(region);
00036   for(std::set<TString>::const_iterator itr = cutSet.begin();
00037       itr != cutSet.end();
00038       itr++){
00039     TString cut_string = *itr;
00040 #ifdef DEBUG
00041     std::cout << cut_string << std::endl;
00042 #endif
00043     if(isMC && cut_string.Contains("runNumber")){
00044       cut_string.Insert(0,"(");
00045       cut_string+="|| runNumber==1)"; 
00046     }
00047     if(isMC && cut_string.Contains("lumiBlock")) continue;
00048     //      std::cout << "[DEBUG] Skipping runNumber cut for MC " << isMC << "\t" << string << std::endl;
00049 
00050     if(isMC==false && (corrEle || _corrEle)){
00051       //std::cerr << "[INFO] scaleEle for GetCut" << std::endl;
00052       cut_string.ReplaceAll(energyBranchName+"_ele1",energyBranchName+"_ele1 * scaleEle_ele1");
00053       cut_string.ReplaceAll(energyBranchName+"_ele2",energyBranchName+"_ele2 * scaleEle_ele2");
00054       TString invMassName=energyBranchName; invMassName.ReplaceAll("energySCEle","invMass_SC");
00055       cut_string.ReplaceAll(invMassName,invMassName+"*sqrt(scaleEle_ele1 * scaleEle_ele2)");
00056     }
00057     // se contiene solo ele2 rimuovi, altrimenti sostituisci
00058     if(nEle!=0){
00059       if(nEle==1){
00060         cut_string.ReplaceAll("_ele2","_ele1");
00061       } else {
00062         cut_string.ReplaceAll("_ele1","_ele2");
00063       }
00064 
00065 //       if(nEle==1){
00066 //      if(!cut_string.Contains("_ele1")) continue;
00067 //      else cut_string.ReplaceAll("_ele2","_ele1");
00068 //       } else {
00069 //      if(!cut_string.Contains("_ele2")) continue;
00070 //      else cut_string.ReplaceAll("_ele1","_ele2");
00071 //       }
00072     }
00073     if(!_isRooFit){
00074       //  TString cut_string(cut_string_string);
00075       cut_string.ReplaceAll("_ele1", "[0]");
00076       cut_string.ReplaceAll("_ele2", "[1]");
00077     }
00078 
00079     cut+=cut_string;
00080   }
00081 #ifdef DEBUG
00082   std::cout << cut << std::endl;
00083 #endif
00084   return cut; //full AND of cuts
00085 
00086 }

00089 std::set<TString> ElectronCategory_class::GetCutSet(TString region){
00090   TCut cut_string;
00091   cut_string.Clear();
00092 
00093   std::set<TString> cutSet;
00094   // events %2 == 0 are dropped
00095   TCut odd_cut = "eventNumber%2 !=0";
00096   TCut even_cut = "eventNumber%2 ==0";
00097   
00098 
00099   //Need to implement this part for Pt
00100   //
00101   TCut EB_ele1_cut = "abs(etaEle_ele1) < 1.4442";
00102   TCut EB_ele2_cut = "abs(etaEle_ele2) < 1.4442";
00103   TCut EB_cut = EB_ele1_cut && EB_ele2_cut;
00104 
00105   
00106   TCut EBp_ele1_cut = "etaEle_ele1 > 0 && etaEle_ele1 < 1.4442";
00107   TCut EBp_ele2_cut = "etaEle_ele2 > 0 && etaEle_ele2 < 1.4442";
00108   TCut EBp_cut = EBp_ele1_cut && EBp_ele2_cut;
00109 
00110   TCut EBm_ele1_cut = "etaEle_ele1 < 0 && etaEle_ele1 > -1.4442";
00111   TCut EBm_ele2_cut = "etaEle_ele2 < 0 && etaEle_ele2 > -1.4442";
00112   TCut EBm_cut = EBm_ele1_cut && EBm_ele2_cut;
00113 
00114   TCut EE_ele1_cut = "abs(etaEle_ele1) > 1.566 && abs(etaEle_ele1) < 2.5";
00115   TCut EE_ele2_cut = "abs(etaEle_ele2) > 1.566 && abs(etaEle_ele2) < 2.5";
00116   TCut EE_cut = EE_ele1_cut  &&  EE_ele2_cut;
00117 
00118   
00119   TCut EEp_ele1_cut = "etaEle_ele1 > 1.566 && etaEle_ele1 < 2.5";
00120   TCut EEp_ele2_cut = "etaEle_ele2 > 1.566 && etaEle_ele2 < 2.5";
00121   TCut EEp_cut = EEp_ele1_cut && EEp_ele2_cut;
00122 
00123   TCut EEm_ele1_cut = "etaEle_ele1 < -1.566 && etaEle_ele1 > -2.5";
00124   TCut EEm_ele2_cut = "etaEle_ele2 < -1.566 && etaEle_ele2 > -2.5";

00128   TCut preshower_ele2_cut = "abs(etaEle_ele2) > 1.7";
00129 
00130 
00131 
00132   TCut EBlowEta_ele1_cut = "abs(etaEle_ele1) < 1.";
00133   TCut EBlowEta_ele2_cut = "abs(etaEle_ele2) < 1.";

00135 
00136   TCut EBhighEta_ele1_cut= EB_ele1_cut && "abs(etaEle_ele1) >= 1.";
00137   TCut EBhighEta_ele2_cut= EB_ele2_cut && "abs(etaEle_ele2) >= 1.";
00138   TCut EBhighEta_cut = EBhighEta_ele1_cut && EBhighEta_ele2_cut;
00139 
00140   TCut EElowEta_ele1_cut=       EE_ele1_cut && "abs(etaEle_ele1) < 2.";
00141   TCut EElowEta_ele2_cut = EE_ele2_cut && "abs(etaEle_ele2) < 2.";
00142   TCut EElowEta_cut = EElowEta_ele1_cut && EElowEta_ele2_cut;
00143 
00144   TCut EEhighEta_ele1_cut=  EE_ele1_cut && "abs(etaEle_ele1) >= 2.";
00145   TCut EEhighEta_ele2_cut = EE_ele2_cut && "abs(etaEle_ele2) >= 2.";
00146   TCut EEhighEta_cut = EEhighEta_ele1_cut && EEhighEta_ele2_cut;
00147 
00148 
00149   TCut gold_ele1_cut = "R9Ele_ele1 >= 0.94";
00150   TCut gold_ele2_cut = "R9Ele_ele2 >= 0.94";
00151   TCut gold_cut = gold_ele1_cut && gold_ele2_cut;
00152 
00153   TCut bad_ele1_cut = "R9Ele_ele1 < 0.94";

00159   TCut EBRefReg_ele2_cut = "(abs(seedXSCEle_ele2) > 5 && abs(seedXSCEle_ele2) < 21 && (seedYSCEle_ele2 %20) > 5 && (seedYSCEle_ele2%20) <16)";

00467 
00468         if(string.Contains("EB"))  cut_string+=EB_cut;
00469         else if(string.Contains("EE")) cut_string+=EE_cut;
00470         else cut_string+=EB_cut;
00471 
00472         if(string.Contains("SingleEle")){
00473           cut_string += absEta_ele1_cut || absEta_ele2_cut;
00474           cutSet.insert(TString(absEta_ele1_cut || absEta_ele2_cut));
00475         } else {
00476           cut_string+=absEta_ele1_cut && absEta_ele2_cut;
00477           cutSet.insert(TString(absEta_ele1_cut && absEta_ele2_cut));
00478         }
00479 
00480       } else {
00481 
00482         TObjString *Objstring1 = (TObjString *) splitted->At(1);
00483         TObjString *Objstring2 = (TObjString *) splitted->At(2);
00484       
00485         TString string1 = Objstring1->GetString();
00486         TString string2 = Objstring2->GetString();
00487       
00488         TCut cutEle1_1("(seedXSCEle_ele1) >= "+string1);
00489         TCut cutEle1_2("(seedXSCEle_ele1) <= "+string2);
00490         TCut cutEle2_1("(seedXSCEle_ele2) >= "+string1);
00491         TCut cutEle2_2("(seedXSCEle_ele2) <= "+string2);
00492 
00493         TCut absEta_ele1_cut = cutEle1_1 && cutEle1_2;
00494         TCut absEta_ele2_cut = cutEle2_1 && cutEle2_2;
00495 
00496         if(string.Contains("EB"))  cut_string+=EB_cut;
00497         else if(string.Contains("EE")) cut_string+=EE_cut;
00498         else cut_string+=EB_cut;
00499 
00500         if(string.Contains("SingleEle")){
00501           cut_string += absEta_ele1_cut || absEta_ele2_cut;
00502           cutSet.insert(TString(absEta_ele1_cut || absEta_ele2_cut));
00503         } else {
00504           cut_string+=absEta_ele1_cut && absEta_ele2_cut;
00505           cutSet.insert(TString(absEta_ele1_cut && absEta_ele2_cut));
00506         }
00507 
00508       }
00509       
00510       delete splitted;
00511       continue;
00512     }
00513 
00514     //--------------- runNumber
00515     if(string.Contains("runNumber")){
00516       TObjArray *splitted = string.Tokenize("_");
00517       if(splitted->GetEntries() < 3){

00519         continue;

00526

00528       TCut cut2("runNumber <=  "+string2);
00529

00532           
00533

00535       continue;

00600         std::cerr << "ERROR: incomplete Et region definition" << std::endl;
00601         continue;
00602       } 
00603 
00604       if(splitted->GetEntries() == 2){
00605         TObjString *Objstring1 = (TObjString *) splitted->At(1);
00606

00608         
00609         
00610         TCut cutEle1(""+energyBranchName+"_ele1/cosh(etaSCEle_ele1) >= "+string1);
00611         TCut cutEle2(""+energyBranchName+"_ele2/cosh(etaSCEle_ele2) >= "+string1);
00612         
00613         cut_string+=cutEle1 && cutEle2;
00614         cutSet.insert(TString(cutEle1 && cutEle2));
00615         delete splitted;
00616         continue;
00617       } else{
00618         TObjString *Objstring1 = (TObjString *) splitted->At(1);
00619         TObjString *Objstring2 = (TObjString *) splitted->At(2);
00620       
00621         TString string1 = Objstring1->GetString();
00622         TString string2 = Objstring2->GetString();
00623       
00624         TCut cutEle1_1(""+energyBranchName+"_ele1/cosh(etaSCEle_ele1) >= "+string1);

00626         TCut cutEle2_1(""+energyBranchName+"_ele2/cosh(etaSCEle_ele2) >= "+string1);
00627         TCut cutEle2_2(""+energyBranchName+"_ele2/cosh(etaSCEle_ele2) <  "+string2);
00628 
00629         TCut ele1_cut = cutEle1_1 && cutEle1_2;
00630         TCut ele2_cut = cutEle2_1 && cutEle2_2;
00631 
00632         if(string.Contains("SingleEle")){
00633           cut_string += ele1_cut || ele2_cut;
00634           cutSet.insert(TString(ele1_cut || ele2_cut));
00635         } else {
00636           cut_string+=ele1_cut && ele2_cut;
00637           cutSet.insert(TString(ele1_cut));
00638           cutSet.insert(TString(ele2_cut));
00639         }
00640

00642         continue;
00643       }
00644         
00645

00874 #ifdef GAP
00875     //--------------- Gap
00876     if(string.Contains("EBGapEle")){
00877       TObjArray *splitted = string.Tokenize("_");
00878       if(splitted->GetEntries() < 2){
00879         std::cerr << "ERROR: incomplete EBGapEle1 region definition" << std::endl;
00880         continue;
00881       } 
00882       TString eleIndex;
00883       if(string.Contains("Ele1")) eleIndex="ele1";
00884       if(string.Contains("Ele2")) eleIndex="ele2";
00885       if(eleIndex.Sizeof()<=1){
00886         std::cerr << "[ERROR]: Ele index not defined: EBGapEle1 or EBGapEle2" << std::endl;
00887         continue;
00888       }
00889 
00890       TObjString *Objstring1 = (TObjString *) splitted->At(1);
00891 
00892       TString string1 = Objstring1->GetString();
00893       TString ieta_gap_value=string1; // inutili per ora
00894       TString iphi_gap_value=string1; // inutili per ora
00895 
00896       // attento che la notazione e' invertita:
00897       //  - questo taglio richiede sia fuori dai gap di n ieta_gap_value cristalli
00898 
00899       TCut EB_m1_ietagap_cut("abs(ieta_"+eleIndex+") > 0 +"+ieta_gap_value+" && abs(ieta_"+eleIndex+") < 26-"+ieta_gap_value);
00900       TCut EB_m2_ietagap_cut("abs(ieta_"+eleIndex+") > 25+"+ieta_gap_value+" && abs(ieta_"+eleIndex+") < 46-"+ieta_gap_value);
00901       TCut EB_m3_ietagap_cut("abs(ieta_"+eleIndex+") > 45+"+ieta_gap_value+" && abs(ieta_"+eleIndex+") < 66-"+ieta_gap_value);
00902       TCut EB_m4_ietagap_cut("abs(ieta_"+eleIndex+") > 65+"+ieta_gap_value+" && abs(ieta_"+eleIndex+") < 86-"+ieta_gap_value);
00903 
00904       TCut EB_iphigap_low_cut("(iphi_"+eleIndex+"-1) %20 >= "+iphi_gap_value);
00905       TCut EB_iphigap_high_cut("(iphi_"+eleIndex+"-1) %20 < 20-"+iphi_gap_value);
00906 
00907       TCut ietagap_cut = EB_m1_ietagap_cut || EB_m2_ietagap_cut || EB_m3_ietagap_cut || EB_m4_ietagap_cut;
00908       TCut iphigap_cut = EB_iphigap_low_cut && EB_iphigap_high_cut;
00909 
00910       if(string.Contains("!")) cut_string += ietagap_cut && iphigap_cut;
00911       else      cut_string+= (!ietagap_cut) || (!iphigap_cut);
00912       delete splitted;
00913       continue;
00914     }
00915

00917     //--------------- Gap
00918     if(string.Contains("Mod")){

00921         std::cerr << "ERROR: incomplete EBGapEle1 region definition" << std::endl;
00922         continue;
00923       } 
00924 
00925       TObjString *Objstring1 = (TObjString *) splitted->At(1);
00926

00928

00930       TCut cut2;
00931       if(string1.Contains("1")){
00932         cut1=cut1 || ("abs(seedXSCEle_ele1) < 26");
00933         cut2=cut2 || ("abs(seedXSCEle_ele2) < 26");
00934       }
00935

00937         cut1=cut1 || ("abs(seedXSCEle_ele1) > 25 && abs(seedXSCEle_ele1) < 46");
00938         cut2=cut2 || ("abs(seedXSCEle_ele2) > 25 && abs(seedXSCEle_ele2) < 46");
00939       }
00940

00942         cut1=cut1 || ("abs(seedXSCEle_ele1) > 45 && abs(seedXSCEle_ele1) < 66");
00943         cut2=cut2 || ("abs(seedXSCEle_ele2) > 45 && abs(seedXSCEle_ele2) < 66");
00944       }
00945

00948         cut2=cut2 || ("abs(seedXSCEle_ele2) > 65 && abs(seedXSCEle_ele2) < 86");
00949       }
00950 
00951       cut_string += EB_cut && cut1 && cut2;
00952       delete splitted;
00953       continue;
00954     }

01003     //--------------- invMassRelSigma

01005       TObjArray *splitted = string.Tokenize("_");
01006       if(splitted->GetEntries() < 3){
01007         std::cerr << "ERROR: incomplete invMassSigma region definition" << std::endl;
01008         continue;
01009       }
01010 
01011       TObjString *Objstring0 = (TObjString *) splitted->At(0);
01012       TString string0 = Objstring0->GetString();
01013       for(int i=1; i < splitted->GetEntries()-2; i++){

01224 std::set<TString> ElectronCategory_class::GetBranchNameNtuple(TString region){
01225   
01226   std::set<TString> branchNames;
01227 
01228   TString cut(GetCut(region,false, 1, false));
01229 
01230   TPRegexp reg("[|&!]+");
01231   reg.Substitute(cut," ","g");
01232   reg=TPRegexp("[><=%]+");
01233   reg.Substitute(cut," ","g");
01234   reg=TPRegexp("\\[0\\]");
01235   reg.Substitute(cut," ","g");
01236   reg=TPRegexp("[- .0-9]{2,}");
01237   reg.Substitute(cut," ","g");
01238   reg=TPRegexp("abs[ ]*\\(");
01239   reg.Substitute(cut," ","g");
01240   reg=TPRegexp("cosh[ ]*\\(");
01241   reg.Substitute(cut," ","g");
01242   reg=TPRegexp("[\\(\\)]{1,}");
01243   reg.Substitute(cut,"","g");
01244   reg=TPRegexp("[*/+-]{1,}");
01245   reg.Substitute(cut," ","g");
01246   reg=TPRegexp("[ ]{1,}");
01247   reg.Substitute(cut," ","g");
01248   reg=TPRegexp("SingleEle");
01249   reg.Substitute(cut," ","g");
01250   cut.ReplaceAll("scaleEle","");
01251   
01252   TObjArray *splitted = cut.Tokenize(" ");
01253   for(int i =0; i < splitted->GetEntries(); i++){
01254     TObjString *Objstring1 = (TObjString *) splitted->At(i);
01255     
01256     TString string1 = Objstring1->GetString();
01257 
01258     branchNames.insert(string1);
01259   }
01260 //   std::cout << cut << std::endl;
01261 //   if(cut.Contains("etaEle")) branchNames.insert("etaEle");

01264 //   if(cut.Contains("R9Ele")) branchNames.insert("R9Ele");

01269 //   if(cut.Contains("energySCEle")) branchNames.insert("energySCEle");
01270

01273       itr!=branchNames.end();
